summary: ORIGINAL FRONT BRAKE ROTORS WARPED TWICE CAUSING SEVERE WHEEL SHAKING AND HARD BRAKING. ONCE UNDER WARRANTY ROTORS WERE TURNED BY FORD THEN THEY WARPED AGAIN AFTER WARRANTY WAS UP.  ROTORS WERE TO THIN TO TURN AGAIN CAUSING EXPENSIVE ROTOR AND PAD REPLACEMENT.  NOW LESS THAN ONE YEAR OF REPLACEMENT THE ROTORS ARE STARTING TO WARP AGAIN.   *NLM
